column4: hey, how do i use bittorrent? i get an error every time i try to use it
i have multiverse but i don't thinki  got universe
ok, you need universe as well. Multiverse is for legally questionable stuff
i have universe, did a reload and i still cann't find it
hoary has a bitorrent client enabled by default
to the best of my knowledge, yes
using all memory is not a bad thing
letting go of it is where you need to worry
hoary has been in upstream version freeze for quite some time
